entity.name: The White House

text: @realDonaldTrump You're tossing Molotov cocktails in all directions to gin up a distraction the media will rush to cover instead of 100,000 AMERICANS HAVE DIED FROM COVID-19 IN 5 MONTHS AND 30 MILLION HAVE LOST THEIR JOBS BECAUSE THE BUMBLING USURPER IN THE WHITE HOUSE CHOKED.
